name: Jack & the creepy Castle
description: This cool, creepy Jump’n’Jump game will make you jump higher, jump farther, jump harder! Be strong. Be crazy. Be Jack!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 250 MB available space
